divs: sighting detailsjust viewed your program titled "ufos over earth" last night. it was the episode about various ufo sightings in bucks county. i became extremely interested in denise murter's description of the object she observed. it was exactly the same object we saw on the night of 1\27\1990. so i figured i should report the sighting to mufon. my wife and i were attending a black tie annual awards banquet at the brookville country club located in upper macungie, pa. just south of allentown, pa. i was driving and my wife was in the passenger seat. we were driving west towards the brookville country club. i observed a circular object at 12 o'clock high above us about one mile east of our destination. we thought it could have been an airliner but it did not move like an airplane. it had 3 white headlights surrounded my red lights. it was difficult to tell whether the red lights could have been blinking or rotating. the ufo was high in the sky, estimated 500 to 1,000 feet above us. it dissapeared from my line of sight as i drove under it. however, my wife kept observing it. she said that it moved eratically and disappeared quickly. we read in the philadelphia inquirer that there were several ufo sightings that night around the philadelphia area.
Summary: Observed circular object with 3 white lights surrounded by revolving or blinking red lights,
trends: There have been no other sightings in Upper Macungie
This sighting has never been favorited.
